name: doorstopper
title: Doorstopper
description: Prevent your MacBook from going to sleep when you close the lid
author: roele

commands.name: enable
commands.title: Enable Doorstopper
commands.description: Prevent the MacBook from going to sleep when closing the lid

commands.name: disable
commands.title: Disable Doorstopper
commands.description: Allow the MacBook to go to sleep when closing the lid

commands.name: status
commands.title: Doorstopper Status
commands.description: Check if Doorstopper is enabled or disabled

commands.name: statusmenu
commands.title: Doorstopper Status Menu Bar
commands.description: Get the Doorstopper status in your menu bar

preferences.name: icon
preferences.description: Select icon set for Menu Bar
preferences.title: Menu Bar Icon

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
